name: Crank-olf demo
description:
A golf game that you play using a crank handle.
The faster you crank the harder you take a swing.

  • Beautiful dithering graphics
  • 5 minutes of satisfying gameplay
  • All for $0

The game was made on game jam and is is a short demo with 4 levels.
It is also the first game we made for the playdate console.
